author: Ashish Mehta
text:
I studied in a Christian Missionary School. Yes we were taken to the Church once a week, had Bible classes and were also given a copy of the New Testament.
Even Sikh Schools teach the Granth Sahab.
We totally accept everything. 
Only Hinduism unaccepted. Why? @HMOIndia https://t.co/uRwDHtqNH6
